name: Star Wars: The Old Republic

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars - The Old Republic/launcher.exe

execute.command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars - The Old Republic"

extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars - The Old Republic

merge.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars - The Old Republic

content:
files:
- setup: https://swtor-a.akamaihd.net/installer/SWTOR_setup.exe
- launcher: https://lutris.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/swtor/launcher.settings
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars - The Old Republic/launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msxml3 msls31 winhttp vcrun2008 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    description: Installing winetricks verbs
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /S
    description: Installing SWTOR
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star
      Wars - The Old Republic"
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars -
      The Old Republic
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Temp/InstallSWTOR/swtor.rar
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Electronic Arts/BioWare/Star Wars -
      The Old Republic
    src: launcher
system:
  env:
    PBA_ENABLE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
wine:
  dxvk: false
  esync: true
